attributes.action: abandon any scheme to make elderly drivers retake their driving test.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many people imply that elderly drivers are a major hazard on our roads. The biggest hazard on our roads seems to be young drivers who feel their ability and experience is greater than it is. Why, then, shy away from the real problem, and use older drivers as a scapegoat?
